remarks: Rearrangement of 4 terms in a mixed addition and subtraction. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
subadd4b.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
subadd4b.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
subadd4b.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
subadd4b.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) $.
subadd4b $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A - B ) + ( C - D ) ) = ( ( A - D ) + ( C - B ) ) ) $.
